𒎌 MEŠ 𒈨𒌍 masses! much Mehrzahl many manches > Menschen
𒈨𒌍 MEŠ 𒎌 some reverse 三 𓏪 𓏥 𓏼 3

𒈨𒌍 meš moons 𒌍 𒌋𒌋𒌋

𒈨𒌍 •ING noun/verbal suffix

𒈨𒌍 MEŠ ⇔ 𒅔 homes 𒄩𒀀𒅔 ha-a-in Hain 𓉔 𒀀𒀀𒉌

𒌍 ter 3 terminal sufix, e.g. 𒀀𒈨𒌍 eau𒌍 : waters/waterim reverse 𒈨𒌍=𒌍𒈨

-NESS 𐍆𐌰𐌹𐍂𐌽𐌴𐌹𐍃 fairneis = ver-naiss 𓄟 = old

The Sumero-Akkadian plural 𒎌 MEŠ extends to adjectives:

𒀭𒈨𒌍 𒃲𒈨𒌍
D.MEŠ GAL.MEŠ
daemons megalons
great gods

Or both are nouns: The Gods, The Greats

𒌙 ma.utu mouth / middle moon 𒌗 / month 𒌘 moon 𒌋𒌋 man min 𒌍

plural confused in

𓄟 𓋴 ≈ 𒌉𒎌 #mariˢ ≈ Marias Marien 𓆣
